articles.author: Deutsche Welle
articles.title: Ukraine updates: F-16 training has begun, Kyiv says – DW – 08/20/2023 - DW (English)
articles.description: Ukrainian pilots are currently training to operate American-made F-16 fighter jets at an unknown location. Meanwhile, Volodymyr Zelenskyy vowed to retaliate after a fatal Russian missile strike in Chernihiv. DW has more.
articles.content:
Training for Ukrainian pilots to operate F-16 fighter jets is already underway, officials reiterated on Saturday.
"Training has already started," Ukrainian Defense Minister Oleksii Reznikov told the… [+813 chars]
